name: Gravice
description:
Use gravity to go anywhere. With the power of gravity in your hands, you can go anywhere, just don't hit the ice spikes! 

How to play

WASD- switch gravity

P- pause

The pause menu no longer works after the first level due to a bug. If level 3 doesn't load, reload the page, press the "Levels" button on the title page, and select level 3. The level doesn't load due to a bug I was unable to fix in the time allowed for the jam.
